  index: "my-index-000001",
  query: {
    match: {
      message: "you know for search",
    },
  },
  collapse: {
    field: "user.id",
  },
  rescore: {
    window_size: 50,
    query: {
      rescore_query: {
        match_phrase: {
          message: "you know for search",
        },
      },
      query_weight: 0.3,
      rescore_query_weight: 1.4,
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
